title: ‘Heat 2’ Confirmed To Be Michael Mann’s Next Project
description:
Michael Mann has been involved with a number of fan-favorite films over the decades. Now ahead of the release of his latest movie, Ferrari, Mann has just confirmed his next project. Fans of Heat will be excited to know that Michael Mann will indeed be directing Heat 2 next. This was confirmed by Mann himself […]

The post ‘Heat 2’ Confirmed To Be Michael Mann’s Next Project appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Zack Snyder’s ‘Justice League’ Cast Won’t Return For DCU
description:
Fans of Zack Snyder’s Justice League have been hopeful that the original cast members would still return despite the DCU resetting the franchise. According to a new report, however, the cast of Zack Snyder‘s Justice League will no longer reprise their roles for the new cinematic universe. As shared by Variety, this includes the cast […]

The post Zack Snyder’s ‘Justice League’ Cast Won’t Return For DCU appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Miramax Acquires ‘Halloween’ TV Rights To Begin New Cinematic Universe
description:
It looks like Halloween is coming to television. It’s been confirmed that the iconic horror film franchise is officially moving to the small screen for a brand-new Halloween TV series. Interestingly, however, this is only the first step in creating a new cinematic universe that could also include new movies under the co-ownership of Miramax […]

The post Miramax Acquires ‘Halloween’ TV Rights To Begin New Cinematic Universe appeared first on ScreenGeek.

title: Couple Shares Alleged Captured Footage Of Bigfoot
description:
